Class NoticeboardDTO

java.lang.Object
dto.NoticeboardDTO
public class NoticeboardDTO extends Object

A Noticeboard Data Transfer Object.

The class provides methods to retrieve the attributes and ToDos of a Noticeboard.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NoticeboardDTO(int boardID, String title, String description, int userID)
    Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO with no todos.
    NoticeboardDTO(String title, String description)
    Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO with no ToDos.
    NoticeboardDTO(Noticeboard source)
    Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO copied from a Noticeboard object.

  • Constructor Details

    • NoticeboardDTO

      public NoticeboardDTO(Noticeboard source)

      Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO copied from a Noticeboard object.

      Parameters:
      source - the Noticeboard to copy the attributes and ToDo list from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if source is null

    • NoticeboardDTO

      public NoticeboardDTO(int boardID, String title, String description, int userID)

      Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO with no todos.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID or -1 for an invalid ID
      title - the title
      description - the description
      userID - the User's ID or -1 for an invalid ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if title is null or blank

    • NoticeboardDTO

      public NoticeboardDTO(String title, String description)

      Instantiates a new NoticeboardDTO with no ToDos.

      Parameters:
      title - the title
      description - the description
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if title is null or blank

    • getToDos

      public List<ToDoDTO> getToDos()

      Gets the ToDos.

      Returns:
      if any ToDo exist returns them as a List of ToDoDTO, otherwise returns null

    • getToDoCount

      public int getToDoCount()

      Gets the count of the ToDos of the Noticeboard

      Returns:
      the count of the ToDos

    • getToDo

      public ToDoDTO getToDo(String title)

      Gets ToDo from its title.

      Parameters:
      title - the title
      Returns:
      the ToDoDTO if the Noticeboard displays it, null otherwise
